tool.name: phmmer
tool.description: search a protein sequence against a protein database
tool.command:
phmmer
#if 'tblout' in str($oformat): --tblout $tblout #end if
#if 'domtblout' in str($oformat): --domtblout $domtblout #end if
#if 'pfamtblout' in str($oformat): --pfamtblout $pfamtblout #end if
#for i,oformat_opt in enumerate( str($oformat_opts).split(',') ): --$oformat_opt #end for
#if $hssi.hssi_select == "singlemx": --popen $hssi.popen --pextend $hssi.pextend #end if
-E $E --domE $domE
#if $T: -T $T #end if
#if $domT: --domT $domT #end if
#if $incE: --incE $incE #end if
#if $incT: --incT $incT #end if
#if $incdomE: --incdomE $incdomE #end if
#if $incdomT: --incdomT $incdomT #end if
$max --F1 $F1 --F2 $F2 --F3 $F3 $nobias
--EmL $EmL --EmN $EmN --EvL $EvL --EvN $EvN --EfL $EfL --EfN $EfN --Eft $Eft
$nonull2
#if $Z: -Z $Z #end if
#if $domZ: --domZ $domZ #end if
--cpu \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-2} --seed $seed
$seqfile $seqdb > $output

param.name: seqfile
param.label: Protein sequence to search with

param.name: seqdb
param.label: Sequence Database

param.name: oformat
param.label: Output Formats
param.option: Table of hits and domains in Pfam format (--pfamtblout)

param.name: oformat_opts
param.label: Output Format Options
param.option: Prefer accessions over names in output (--acc)
Don't output alignments, so output is smaller (--noali)
Unlimited ASCII text output line width (--notextw)

param.name: E
param.label: report sequences <= this E-Value threshold in output

param.name: domE
param.label: report domains <= this E-Value threshold in output

param.name: T
param.label: report sequences >= this score threshold in output

param.name: domT
param.label: report domains >= this score threshold in output

param.name: incE
param.label: consider sequences <= this E-Value threshold as significant

param.name: incdomE
param.label: consider domains <= this E-Value threshold as significant

param.name: incT
param.label: consider sequences >= this score threshold as significant

param.name: incdomT
param.label: consider domains >= this score threshold as significant

param.name: cut_ga
param.label: use profile's GA gathering cutoffs to set all thresholding

param.name: cut_nc
param.label: use profile's NC gathering cutoffs to set all thresholding

param.name: cut_tc
param.label: use profile's TC gathering cutoffs to set all thresholding

param.name: max
param.label: Turn all heuristic filters off (less speed, more power)

param.name: F1
param.label: Stage 1 (MSV) threshold: promote hits w/ P <= F1

param.name: F2
param.label: Stage 2 (Vit) threshold: promote hits w/ P <= F2

param.name: F3
param.label: Stage 3 (Fwd) threshold: promote hits w/ P <= F3

param.name: nobias
param.label: Turn off composition bias filter

param.name: EmL
param.label: Length of sequences for MSV Gumbel mu fit

param.name: EmN
param.label: Number of sequences for MSV Gumbel mu fit

param.name: EvL
param.label: Length of sequences for Viterbi Gumbel mu fit

param.name: EvN
param.label: Number of sequences for Viterbi Gumbel mu fit

param.name: EfL
param.label: Length of sequences for Forward exp tail tau fit

param.name: EfN
param.label: Number of sequences for Forward exp tail tau fit

param.name: Eft
param.label: tail mass for Forward exponential tail tau fit

param.name: hssi_select
param.label: Options for handling single sequence inputs
param.option: Use substitution score matrix for single-sequence inputs

param.name: popen
param.label: gap open probability

param.name: pextend
param.label: gap extend probability

param.name: nonull2
param.label: Turn off biased composition score corrections

param.name: Z
param.label: # of comparisons done for E-value calculation

param.name: domZ
param.label: # of significant sequences, for domain E-value calculation

param.name: seed
param.label: RNG seed, 0 generates a random seed

data.name: tblout
data.label: Table of per-sequence hits from HMM matches of $seqfile.name in $seqdb.name

data.name: domtblout
data.label: Table of per-domain hits from HMM matches of $seqfile.name in $seqdb.name

data.name: pfamtblout
data.label: Table of per-sequence/per-domain hits from HMM matches of $seqfile.name in $seqdb.name
